head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KRASNOW, ROSALYN C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KRASNOW, ROSALYN C.

block.p: KRASNOW-Rosalyn C. On Sunday, September 10, 2000, of Silver Spring, MD. formerly of Scarsdale, NY; beloved wife of the late Kenneth I. Krasnow; devoted mother of Steven Jed (Rose G.) Krasnow, Andrew Krasnow, Stuart Krasnow and the late Daniel and Elaine Krasnow, loving sister of Helen (Arthur) Zeldin; also survived by 5 grandchildren, Evelyn, Andrea, Kevin, Kimberly and Elena Krasnow. Graveside funeral services were held on Tuesday, September 12, at Sharon Gardens, a division of Kensico Cemetery in Valhalla, NY. Family will be receiving friends Wednesday and Thursday at 7:30 P.M. at the residence of Steven Jed and Rose G. Krasnow. In lieu of flowers memorial contributions may be made to Elaine Beth Krasnow Foundation, 9071 Wonderland Park Ave., Los Angeles, CA 90046. For information Edward Sagel Funeral Direction, Inc., 800-217-9403.
